mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS(CAT,SEQ,ID,REF,STEP,DEPTH,TITLE,CONTENT,WDATE,DEL,READCOUNT,IMG,BLIKE) VALUES (#{cat} , NEXTVAL(SEQ__BBS), #{id} , (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF)+1,0)FROM BBS ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY) ,0 , 0 , #{title} , #{content} ,NOW(), 0,0,0,0 )
